content:
Q: If I make a claim for Windscreen, do I have to reinstate my windscreen cover after a claim? Will my NCD be affected?
A: For HL Assurance Motor policy, your windscreen cover will be automatically reinstated at no cost to you without affecting NCD.
questions: What happens to my windscreen cover after I make a claim?
Is there a cost to reinstate windscreen cover after a claim with HL Assurance Motor policy?
Does making a windscreen claim affect my No Claim Discount with HL Assurance?
Will my windscreen cover be automatically reinstated after a claim?
Is there any additional fee for reinstating windscreen cover in the HL Assurance Motor policy?
After claiming for windscreen, will my No Claim Discount remain unaffected?
What is the policy of HL Assurance regarding windscreen cover reinstatement post-claim?
Does HL Assurance provide free reinstatement of windscreen cover after a claim?
How does a windscreen claim impact my insurance benefits with HL Assurance?
Can I expect any changes to my No Claim Discount after a windscreen claim with HL Assurance?
